backend/main.mo: Defines the actor, cemetery data models, public and admin types, and comparison utilities for grave and deceased records, including extended site content fields.
backend/migration.mo: Provides migration logic converting old site content to the new format by adding the searchDisclaimer HTML section.
feature_evidence.json: Describes feature evidence linking publishing Draft Version 26 to related files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files for build documentation and reference.
Documentation explaining how to publish Draft Version 26 as the active preview build and verify deployment.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode overrides, and base styling tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling authentication, layout, theme, lazy loading of public/admin pages, and profile setup gating.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGrave: Shows an interactive admin map of cemetery graves with status coloring and supports opening a grave edit dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/CemeteryLa: Provides UI for adding and removing alleys and graves in the cemetery layout using query mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/GraveEditD: Dialog for creating or editing a grave, including status, owner, deceased persons, and payment fields.
frontend/src/components/admin/GraveManag: Admin interface for searching, listing, paginating, and creating graves with an optional edit dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/imageEditi: Utility functions for loading images, converting files to data URLs, and resizing images into Uint8Array blobs.
frontend/src/components/admin/ImageUploa: Handles image selection, validation, preview, resizing, and upload with progress tracking for admin image updates.
Component that generates a cemetery PDF by building HTML from grave and cemetery data, with status formatting and a generation button.
frontend/src/components/admin/SiteConten: Admin UI for editing site content including hero, footer, prayer, and cemetery sections, with image upload and update mutations.
frontend/src/components/ConnectionStatus: Displays connection status or warnings based on actor availability and network readiness.
frontend/src/components/FloatingLoginCon: Floating login button for administrators using Internet Identity with tooltip and disabled state handling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays footer content with contact details, fallback data, and a site credit, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/GraveResultsList: Renders public or admin grave search results with status badges and optional editing for admins.
frontend/src/components/GraveSearch.tsx: Provides grave search with in‑memory filtering, loading state handling, and separate logic for admin and public views.
frontend/src/components/GraveTileMap.tsx: Shows a cemetery tile map with status‑colored grave tiles and a legend, using fetched cemetery layout and tile data.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the site header with logo, theme toggle, and optional logout based on authentication state.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Displays a hero banner with dynamic background, title, scripture quote, and introductory text, with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal form for initial user profile setup, allowing name and optional email submission with validation and status feedback.
frontend/src/components/PublicSectionsTi: Renders selectable public section tiles with icons and labels, invoking a callback when a tile is clicked.
frontend/src/components/SiteContentLoadE: Displays an alert banner indicating site content loading errors with an optional custom message.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks managing Internet Identity authentication, login state, and persisted identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks and retry logic for fetching and mutating backend cemetery, graves, user, and site content data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styling for the frontend.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Renders an admin dashboard with tabbed sections loading various management components via React.lazy.
frontend/src/pages/PublicPage.tsx: Displays the public-facing site with search, map, and optional prayer/about sections, using lazy-loaded components.
frontend/src/utils/graveFullTextSearch.t: Provides in-memory text search utilities for graves in admin and public modes with differing searchable fields.
frontend/src/utils/graveStatusStyles.ts: Defines styling helpers and labels for grave status values such as paid, unpaid, reserved, and free.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters with hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS, extending theme colors, containers, animations, and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Contains project metadata including versioning, notes, known issues, and existing feature requests.
